properties.name: ratelimiter.capacity
properties.description: Value for the capacity of the bucket used by the ratelimiter interceptor. A token-bucket based algorithm is used to limit rate of request to a specific endpoint

properties.name: ratelimiter.refilltime
properties.description: Value for the time interval waited before refill the bucket used by the ratelimiter interceptor. A token-bucket based algorithm is used to limit rate of request to a specific endpoint
